quote: True wisdom is knowing that you know nothing.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: Better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to speak and remove all doubt.
author: Dao De Jing

quote: The only thing more expensive than education is ignorance.
author: Confucius

quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Buddha

quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count, it's the life in your years.
author: Confucius

quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: Buddha

quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
author: Buddha

quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap, but by the seeds that you plant.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Buddha

quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
author: Confucius

quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched – they must be felt with the heart.
author: Buddha

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Buddha

quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
author: Buddha

quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
author: Buddha

quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
author: Buddha

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Buddha

quote: In this world, nothing can be said to be certain, except death and taxes.
author: Buddha

quote: Life is either a daring adventure, or nothing at all.
author: Helen Keller

quote: What we think, we become.
author: Buddha

quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
author: Buddha

quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
author: Buddha

quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: Money and success don’t change people; they merely amplify what is already there.
author: Buddha

quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Confucius

quote: Not how long, but how well you have lived is the main thing.
author: Confucius

quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
author: Buddha

quote: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one’s destiny to do, and then do it.
author: Buddha

quote: In order to write about life first you must live it.
author: Buddha

quote: The big lesson in life, baby, is never be scared of anyone or anything.
author: Buddha

quote: Curiosity about life in all of its aspects, I think, is still the secret of great creative people.
author: Buddha

quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
author: Buddha

quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Buddha

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: May you live all the days of your life.
author: Buddha

quote: Life itself is the most wonderful fairy tale.
author: Buddha

quote: Do not let making a living prevent you from making a life.
author: Buddha

quote: Life is ours to be spent, not to be saved.
author: Buddha

quote: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there’s so much to smile about.
author: Buddha

quote: Life is a long lesson in humility.
author: Buddha

quote: In three words I can sum up everything I’ve learned about life: It goes on.
author: Buddha

quote: Life is made of ever so many partings welded together.
author: Buddha

quote: As you know, life is an echo; we get what we give.
author: Buddha

quote: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: My life is my message.
author: Buddha

quote: Life is really simple, but men insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor.
author: Sholom Aleichem

quote: When life gives you lemons, make lemonade.
author: Buddha

quote: Life is a tragedy when seen in close-up, but a comedy in long-shot.
author: Buddha

quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
author: Buddha

quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
author: Buddha

quote: The truth is you don't know what is going to happen tomorrow. Life is a crazy ride, and nothing is guaranteed.
author: Buddha

quote: Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air.
author: Buddha

quote: The greatest pleasure of life is love.
author: Buddha

quote: Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be.
author: Buddha
